abstract: Cyberattackers are now focusing their assaults on PC and Web applications, such as Microsoft Office and Adobe Flash, and corporate Web sites. That’s because those areas get scant attention from corporate I.T. security professionals.
snippet: Cyberattackers are now focusing their assaults on PC and Web applications, such as Microsoft Office and Adobe Flash, and corporate Web sites. That’s because those areas get scant attention from corporate I.T. security professionals.
lead_paragraph: Update | 8:48 a.m. Fixed broken link to SANS Institute report.

headline.main: Security Pros Are Focused on the Wrong Threats
